urls.title: Dr. Anthony Fauci says Gilead's remdesivir will set a new 'standard of care' for coronavirus treatment
urls.description: Speaking to reporters, Fauci says he was told data from the trial showed a "clear-cut positive effect in diminishing time to recover."
